markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Suspect of Opportunity](/Feats.aspx?ID=5960) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=818" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 110 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Person of Interest](/Feats.aspx?ID=5943)

**Trigger**
A creature who isn’t, to your knowledge, tied to any of your active investigations takes a hostile action against you in combat.

</column>

---

Sometimes something intrudes upon your case unexpectedly, such as an ambush sent to bring your investigation to a close. You use Person of Interest against the triggering creature. This doesn't allow you to use Person of Interest more frequently than normal.
name: Suspect of Opportunity
